actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

official_title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Y(+/-) -2-(2,4-dichlrophenyl)-3-(1H-1,2,4-triazole-1-yl) propyl, 1,1,2,2-tetrafluoroethyl ether?.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on Y(+/-) -2-(2,4-dichlrophenyl)-3-(1H-1,2,4-triazole-1-yl) propyl, 1,1,2,2-tetrafluoroethyl ether?.

titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Y(+/-) -2-(2,4-dichlrophenyl)-3-(1H-1,2,4-triazole-1-yl) propyl, 1,1,2,2-tetrafluoroethyl ether?.
